original_text: “‘If a man has sexual relations with a man as one does with a woman, both of them have done what is detestable. They are to be put to death; their blood will be on their own heads.
korean_text: 누구든지 여인과 동침하듯 남자와 동침하면 둘 다 가증한 일을 행함인즉 반드시 죽일지니 자기의 피가 자기에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: If a man has sexual relations with a man
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 남자가 다른 남자와 성관계를 맺으면
